com.rift.coad.daemon.servicebroker
Interface ServiceBroker

All Superinterfaces:
java.rmi.Remote
public interface ServiceBroker
extends java.rmi.Remote

The purpose of this Daemon is to allow the registration of services within a database which allows the JNDI's for those services to be retrieved.

Field Summary
static java.lang.String JNDI_URL
          The jndi url for the service broker.
 
Method Summary
 java.lang.String getServiceProvider(java.util.List services)
          This method is used to retrieve the JNDI for a service by searching for the supplied Strings within the database.
 java.util.List getServiceProviders(java.util.List services)
          This method is used to retrieve multiple JNDI values from the database.
 void registerService(java.lang.String JNDI, java.util.List services)
          This method is used to register a service and its JNDI on the database.
 void removeServiceProviders(java.lang.String JNDI, java.util.List services)
          This method is used to remove a service from the database.
 

Field Detail

JNDI_URL

static final java.lang.String JNDI_URL
The jndi url for the service broker.

See Also:
Constant Field Values
Method Detail

registerService

void registerService(java.lang.String JNDI,
                     java.util.List services)
                     throws java.rmi.RemoteException,
                            ServiceBrokerException
This method is used to register a service and its JNDI on the database. It will also pass the service to it's parent.

Parameters:
JNDI - This is a String containing the JNDI of the service.
services - This is a List containing Strings by which the daemon is linked to the services it provides.
Throws:
java.rmi.RemoteException
ServiceBrokerException

getServiceProvider

java.lang.String getServiceProvider(java.util.List services)
                                    throws java.rmi.RemoteException,
                                           ServiceBrokerException
This method is used to retrieve the JNDI for a service by searching for the supplied Strings within the database.

Parameters:
services - This is a List containing Strings by which the service can be identified.
Returns:
Returns the necessary JNDI.
Throws:
java.rmi.RemoteException
ServiceBrokerException

getServiceProviders

java.util.List getServiceProviders(java.util.List services)
                                   throws java.rmi.RemoteException,
                                          ServiceBrokerException
This method is used to retrieve multiple JNDI values from the database.

Parameters:
services - This is a List containing Strings by which the service can be identified.
Returns:
Returns a list of multiple JNDI's.
Throws:
java.rmi.RemoteException
ServiceBrokerException

removeServiceProviders

void removeServiceProviders(java.lang.String JNDI,
                            java.util.List services)
                            throws java.rmi.RemoteException,
                                   ServiceBrokerException
This method is used to remove a service from the database.

Parameters:
JNDI - This is a string containing the JNDI of the service you wish to remove.
services - This is a List of the services that are linked to that JNDI.
Throws:
java.rmi.RemoteException
ServiceBrokerException
